alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Poinsett (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 12 at 12:14AM CST until January 12 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Craighead County in eastern Arkansas... Poinsett County in eastern Arkansas... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1214 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Newport, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Jonesboro, Trumann, Harrisburg, Bono, Bay, Brookland, Weiner, Cash, Egypt, Waldenburg, Greenfield, Fisher, Hergett, Apt, Valley View, Weona, Gum Point, Farrville, Dorothy, and Maple Grove. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
